title: Li + H2O - increase rxn rate between Li and H2O

content.prompt: Which of the following changes will most likely increase the rate of reaction between Li(s) and water?

choices.label: Using 125 mL of water instead of 100 mL
Using a 0.25 g sample of Li(s) instead of a 0.35 g sample
Using a 0.35 g sample of Li(s) cut into small pieces
Decreasing the water temperature before adding the Li(s)

skill.text: 2.F: Explain how modifications to an experimental procedure will alter results.
